org.apache.beam.sdk.io.hcatalog.test

Class EmbeddedMetastoreService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.io.hcatalog.test.EmbeddedMetastoreService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    @Internal
public final class EmbeddedMetastoreService
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Implementation of a light-weight embedded metastore. This class is a trimmed-down version of https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/hcatalog/core/src/test/java/org/apache/hive/hcatalog/mapreduce/HCatBaseTest.java

    Used only for testing.
